1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David yet max tzulay yuj Natán is chekbej Dios ti', yet max yionxac'al ix Betsabé yistzilok, a ton ix yistzilben Urías.</e> <pb/><t>A yuj a camc'ulal ach in Diosal, ok' wal a c'ul win. A yuj a miman yabenc'ulal, joc'ay in mul.</t>
2: <t>Tx'aj in el yin masanil in yobtakil. Sakbanej in el yin in mul.</t>
3: <t>Yel, in mul toni, tol max quin ec' yiban; c'am chi el in mul junok bek in c'atan.</t>
4: <t>Max oc in mul, asan ayach max oc in mul. Max wun tzet yetal yob yul a sat. A xan watx' ach yin in ak'on cuenta; c'am chi je' yal-lay yob en yet chin a beyc'ulnej.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Wal yel, yob in yintaxc'al waljubal. Yobtakwom inxa yet mojbil into yuj in txutx.</t>
6: <t>Wal yel, chi cha a c'ul mactxel tol yin masanil is c'ul chi yochej tojolal. Yuj tu' ak' jelanilal bay wanimail.</t>
7: <t>Ican el in mul, cax chin watx'jican elok. Tx'aj in elok yet watx' sakxac'al chi wuncan axca sakil sakbacom.</t>
8: <t>Iaj can in tzalojc'ulal in k'ana'. Ak' tzaloj in c'ul junelxa, caxc'al max quin ak' cuenta sic'libil.</t>
9: <t>Ican el in mul yul a sat in k'ana', cax cha joonc'ay masanil in yobtakilal.</t>
10: <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, a jun nabalej watx' chacan oc win. Ak' in beybalnej ikemalil junelxa.</t>
11: <t>Manchak in ecan el a satak, tamwal checan el a Santo Espíritu win.</t>
12: <t>Ak' in tzalojc'ulal junelxa yuj in colbanil. Ak' in beybalnej ikemalil yin masanil in c'ul,</t>
13: <t>yet watx' chin cuy eb ec'nakwom yin a beybal, axa eb yobtakwom chi meltzoj oc eb yul a k'ab.</t>
14: <t>Ach in Diosal, tol max ak' in colbanil, ak'om cam anima in, colin el yin in mul, cax ok walon el a tojolal yin bitalil.</t>
15: <pb/><t>Mamin, jak in ti', cax ok ach in bitneni.</t>
16: <t>Tolok wal a ofrenda, c'al xajanbal chochej xin, chim laj wak'a', akxa xin, c'am chochej paxok.</t>
17: <t>A tzet chochej, a ton eb manxa animaok ay c'ul yuj is mul. Ach Dios, c'am ton chentaknej el anima tol max yiay ba yuj max na ba c'ul.</t>
18: <pb/><t>Ak' a watx'c'ulal bay Sión yuj watx'il a c'ul. Watx'nej aj murallail Jerusalén junelxa.</t>
19: <t>Catam wal tu' yin tzalojc'ulal ok yun a chaon xajanbal, atac'ala' yalon ley, a ton no no' tol chi tz'a'i. Catam wal tu' ok oc no wacax yin xajanbal bay a altar.</t>
